Html: I have installed the add in for vs2008 and when I add a .chirp.less file, no code behind files are created. If I open the file and save I get an error message saying "Zippy Chirp Burped", Any idea what could be wrong?

I get the same error with any file with a chirp extension! I've uninstalled and re-installed but no luck :(

 

All the files seem to be in the VS2008\addins directory and I can't find the options for the plugin in case theres a settings issue!

I'm having the same problem. It looks like the download for Visual Studio 2008 is a bit old and may be very buggy. I tried installing the current release but the add-in doesn't even show up in Visual Studio 2008. Anyone have an idea on how to get this to work in VS 2008?
Get last source code version is work for me in visual studio 2008 and 2010.
